flavor: We are the slayers of kings, the destroyers of worlds, the bringers of ruination and death in all its forms.
text: Reaction: After an enemy unit at this planet is destroyed, gain 1[RESOURCE].
title: Captain Cato Sicarius

flavor: Damn it, follow me. I'll show you how it's done.
text: Each other Soldier or Warrior unit you control at this planet gets +1 ATK.
title: Colonel Straken

flavor: Alright you gitz! Time fer da 'umies to see wot it means ta mess wit da Bad Moons!
text: Each other unit you control at this planet gains Brutal. (Each unit with Brutal gets +1 ATK for each damage on it.)
title: Nazdreg

flavor: Let me show you the true power of Chaos!
text: Interrupt: When damage is assigned to an enemy unit at this planet, increase that damage by 1.
title: Zarathur, High Sorcerer

flavor: Pain is an art, and the coliseum my canvas.
text: After this warlord commits to a planet, put a Khymera token into play at this planet.
title: Packmaster Kith

flavor: The gaze of Alaitoc sees all, there will be no escape for you.
text: After this warlord commits to a planet, exhaust a target non-warlord unit at that planet.
title: Eldorath Starbane

flavor: We act as one and united we cannot fall.
text: After this warlord commits to a planet, put a [TAU] attachment with printed cost 2 or lower or “Shadowsun's Stealth Cadre” from your hand or discard pile into play attached to an eligible unit at this planet.
title: Commander Shadowsun

text: Reaction: After this unit enters play, move a target enemy army unit at an adjacent planet to this planet and deal it 1 damage.
title: Sicarius's Chosen

flavor: Within the walls of this impregnable fortress, Captain Sicarius crafts his brilliant strategies and perfects the deadly art of war.
text: Reaction: After an enemy unit is destroyed, exhaust this support to ready a target [SPACE MARINE] unit at the same planet.
title: Cato's Stronghold

text: Reaction: After a [SPACE MARINE] unit damages an enemy non-warlord unit by an attack, destroy the attacked unit.
title: The Fury of Sicarius

text: Limit 1 Relic per player. Attach to a unique unit. Attached unit gets +1 ATK and gains Armorbane. (Shield cards cannot be used while this unit is attacking.)
title: Tallassarian Tempest Blade

flavor: With enough time these scouts learn what it truly means to be an Adeptus Astartes, an Angel of Death.
title: 10th Company Scout

text: Area Effect (1). (When this unit attacks it may instead deal its Area Effect damage to each enemy unit at this planet.)
title: Tactical Squad Cardinis

text: Enemy units cannot attack this unit while you control a unit not named “Honored Librarian” at this planet.
title: Honored Librarian

text: While this unit is ready, it gains, “Interrupt: When this unit is assigned damage, prevent 1 of that damage.”
title: Blood Angels Veterans

text: Area Effect (2). (When this unit attacks it may instead deal its Area Effect damage to each enemy unit at this planet.)
title: Daring Assault Squad

text: No Wargear Attachments. Non-Vehicle units you control at this planet cannot be targeted by enemy card abilities.
title: Land Raider

flavor: An ancient warrior is entombed within the heart of each of these mighty devices, mortally wounded but kept alive with the help of lost technology.
text: No Wargear Attachments.
title: Ultramarines Dreadnought

text: Combat Action: Pay the printed cost of a [SPACE MARINE] unit in your hand to put it into play at this planet.
title: Veteran Brother Maxos

flavor: Many Space Marine recruits leap into action with little regard for themselves, desiring to prove themselves to their battle-brothers.
text: Ambush. (You may deploy this card during the combat phase.)
title: Eager Recruit

flavor: Trained by the Adeptus Mechanicus on Mars, Techmarines are the stewards of their chapter's weaponry and vehicles.
text: This unit gains 1 command icon for each enemy unit at this planet.
title: Iron Hands Techmarine

text: No Wargear Attachments. Flying. (This unit takes half damage from non-flying units.)
title: Raven Guard Speeder

flavor: “Where they stand, non shall pass.” -Grand Master Belial
title: Deathwing Guard

text: Combat Action: Target a planet where a battle is taking place. Search the top 6 cards of your deck for a [Space Marine] unit with printed cost 3 or lower. Put that unit into play at the targeted planet, and place the remaing cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
title: Drop Pod Assault

flavor: “On our honor and for the Emperor, we shall not fall!” -Brother Vandius, Ultramarines
text: Reaction: After a [SPACE MARINE] unit is assigned damage by an attack, prevent all of that damage.
title: Indomitable

flavor: When a threat is so great that not even the Space Marines can conquer it, obliteration is the only option.
text: Deploy Action: Destroy all non-unique units at a target non-first planet.
title: Exterminatus

text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gets +1 ATK, +1 HP and while it is attacking ignores the Flying keyword on enemy units.
title: Godwyn Pattern Bolter

text: Limit 1 Relic per player. Attach to a unique unit. Reaction: After attached unit is assigned damage by an attack, exhaust this attachment to prevent all of that damage.
title: Iron Halo

text: Limited. (Limit one Limited card per round.) Interrupt: When you deploy a [SPACE MARINE] unit, exhaust this support to reduce that unit's cost by 1.
title: Fortress-Monastery

text: Reaction: After a [SPACE MARINE] unit enters your discard pile from play, exhaust this support to return that unit to your hand.
title: Holy Sepulchre

text: Interrupt: When this unit leaves play, put a Guardsman token into play at the same planet.
title: Straken's Command Squad

flavor: An iron bastion from which to stem the flow of enemy assaults.
text: Reaction: After you win a command struggle, put a Guardsman token into play at that planet.
title: Omega Zero Command

text: Reaction: After a unit is assigned damage by an attack, sacrifice a Soldier or Warrior unit at the same planet to prevent all of that damage. Then, deal X damage to the attacker. X is the sacrificed unit's printed ATK value.
title: Glorious Intervention

text: Attach to an army unit. Attached unit gets +1 ATK. Interrupt: When attached unit leaves play, draw 3 cards.
title: Straken's Cunning

text: Ranged. (This unit attacks during the ranged skirmish at the beginning of a battle.)
title: Ratling Deadeye

text: Ranged. (This unit attacks during the ranged skirmish at the beginning of a battle.) Reaction: After an army unit you control at this planet leaves play, ready this unit.
title: Cadian Mortar Squad

flavor: Each psyker is a calculated risk for the Astra Militarum. Though trained to resist the dangers of the warp, one slip of their vigilance can see them bound to the power of Chaos.
title: Sanctioned Psyker

flavor: “What I cannot crush with words, I will crush with the tanks of the Imperial Guard!” -Lord Solar Macharius
text: No Wargear Attachments.
title: Leman Russ Battle Tank

text: No Wargear Attachments. Area Effect (1). (When this unit attacks it may instead deal its Area Effect damage to each enemy unit at this planet.)
title: Mordian Hellhound

text: No Wargear Attachments. Flying. (This unit takes half damage from non-flying units.)
title: Assault Valkyrie

flavor: As tough as a grox and just as smart.
text: Immune to enemy events.
title: Stalwart Ogryn

flavor: “A good soldier obeys without question. A good officer commands without doubt.” -Tactica Imperialis
text: Action: Sacrifice an [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit at this planet to exhaust a target non-warlord unit at this planet. (Limit once per phase.)
title: Captain Markis

text: Interrupt: When this unit leaves play, search the top 6 cards of your deck for an [ASTRA MILITARUM] support card with printed cost 2 or lower. Put that card into play at your HQ, and place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
title: Enginseer Augur

flavor: “Only in death shall my crimes be forgiven.” -Penal Legionnaire XXVII
title: Penal Legionnaire

flavor: They may be outmatched, but they are never outnumbered.
text: This unit gets +2 ATK for each support card you control.
title: Infantry Conscripts

text: Interrupt: When a Soldier or Warrior unit you control leaves play from a planet, put this unit into play from your hand at the same planet.
title: Elysian Assault Team

text: Combat Action: Target up to 3 [ASTRA MILITARUM] units you control at the same planet. Each targeted unit gains Ranged until the end of the phase. (Units with Ranged attack during the ranged skirmish at the beginning of a battle.)
title: Preemptive Barrage

flavor: “Let's see them charge through this!” -Corporal Valz
text: Combat Action: Exhaust a unit you control to exhaust a target non-warlord unit at the same planet.
title: Suppressive Fire

flavor: The Cadian tri-dome helmet and mark XI re-breather are renowned for their defence against environmental toxins and noxious gases.
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gets +3 HP.
title: Hostile Environment Gear

text: Attach to an army unit you control. Forced Reaction: After a unit you control is assigned damage by an attack at this planet, reassign 1 of that damage to attached unit.
title: Bodyguard

text: Limited. (Limit one Limited card per round.) Interrupt: When you deploy an [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit, exhaust this support to reduce that unit's cost by 1.
title: Imperial Bunker

text: If this card has 4 or more damage on it, sacrifice it. Interrupt: When damage is assigned to a unit you control, exhaust this support to reassign 1 of that damage to this support.
title: Rockcrete Bunker

flavor: Capturing it was easy. Keeping it was the trickey part
text: Combat Action: Exhaust this support to give a target unit +2 ATK for its next attack this phase.
title: Catachan Outpost

text: Battle: Move a non-warlord unit you control to a planet of your choice.
title: Plannum

text: Battle: Deal 1 damage to each enemy unit at a target HQ or adjacent planet.
title: Atrox Prime

text: Battle: Discard 1 card at random from your opponent's hand.
title: Barlus

text: Battle: Search the top 3 cards of your deck for a card. Add it to your hand, and place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
title: Elouith

text: Battle: Trigger the Battle ability of another planet in play.
title: Carnath

text: Battle: If you control fewer units than your opponent, gain 3[RESOURCE] or draw 3 cards.
title: Tarrus

text: Battle: Take 1[RESOURCE] from your opponent.
title: Osus IV

text: Battle: Rout a target non-warlord unit.
title: Ferrin

text: Battle: Each player puts a unit into play from his hand at his HQ.
title: Y'varn

text: Battle: Remove all damage from a target unit.
title: Iridial
